pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, January 10, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Kamloops, British Columbia

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will tour the new Industrial Training and Technology Centre at Thompson Rivers University, and will deliver remarks. A media availability will follow.

Trades and Technology School
Thompson Rivers University
1080 University Drive

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity for tour
    • Open coverage for remarks and media availability
    • Media should present themselves to the caf√© area on the second floor, accessed by the main entrance off University Drive, no later than 8:15 a.m.

10:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with seniors at the Kamloops Centre for Seniors Information.

Kamloops Centre for Seniors Information
Unit 9A-1800 Tranquille Road

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity
    • Media should arrive no later than 10:15 a.m.

Regina, Saskatchewan

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a town hall Q&A.

Gym 3, Centre for Kinesiology, Health and Sport
University of Regina
3737 Wascana Parkway

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media requiring parking for satellite trucks should contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
    • Media requiring advance set-up will have site access as of 5:00 p.m. All media should arrive no later than 6:30 p.m.
